name: Project: Ninja
description:
Project: Ninja is a drag-and-shoot endless runner that requires precision and reflex to scale the heights of the tallest building in the city. You are able to use magic to transform between 4 different elemental states and you must use your knowledge of science to switch to an appropriate state to get past the obstacles on the way up.

Controls: Left-click to  drag and shoot in a direction, Q-W-E-R to switch to a different state.
